trans-unit.source: Represents an individual <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> row header.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader"></xref> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether the row is selected.
`true` if the row is selected; otherwise, `false`.
The registered default is `false`.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader.IsRowSelected"></xref> dependency property.

Measures the children of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader"></xref> to prepare for arranging them during the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)"></xref> pass.
The available size that this element can give to child elements.
Indicates an upper limit that child elements should not exceed.
The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader"></xref> determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of child object allocated sizes.
Builds the visual tree for the row header when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event and initiates row selection or drag operations.
This method is called when the row header is clicked.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridRowHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this row header.
A new automation peer for this row header.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to paint the row header separator lines.
The brush used to paint row header separator lines.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader.SeparatorBrush"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the user interface (UI) visibility of the row header separator lines.
The UI visibility of the row header separator lines.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility.Visible"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader.SeparatorVisibility"></xref> dependency property.
